title: Workers' compensation insurance posting
dataVerified: Insurance carrier name, policy number, employer name, claim contact info
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake workers' comp postings. Domain binding verifies insurance carrier. State posting requirement. Injury claim notification. Prevents uninsured employer fraud. Employee protection.
